quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词"astronomy"(天文学)及词根"astro-"(星星)+"-logy"(学科)的误导，将"astrology"误判为"天文学"或"恒星研究"。
quiz_item.sentence: Many people consult **astrology** charts to gain insights into their personality traits or future events based on the positions of celestial bodies at the time of their birth.
